label: 土岐源吾
本: Sand and Pebbles: The Tales of Mujû Ichien, A Voice for Pluralism in Kamakura Buddhism . State University of New York Press . 1985
説明文: Also Minomushi Sanjin.  A skillfull but still little-known painter in the literary" (bunjinga) tradition, frequented Chōboji, where he died and is buried (p. 328).  ［蓑虫山人、文人画、長母寺]"
